WITH CODELIST AS ( SELECT AA.ID , AA.CODE , CAST(RIGHT('0000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.SORT_SEQ, AA.CODE)), 4) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS HIER_ID , 1 AS LEVEL FROM jwa.Codes AA WHERE AA.PARENT_CODE IS NULL
AND ( AA.CODE LIKE '%'+#FIND_TEXT#+'%' OR AA.NAME LIKE '%'+#FIND_TEXT#+'%' OR AA.PARENT_CODE LIKE '%'+#FIND_TEXT#+'%' )
UNION ALL SELECT AA.ID , AA.CODE , CAST(BB.HIER_ID + RIGHT('0000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.SORT_SEQ, AA.CODE)), 4) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS HIER_ID , BB.LEVEL + 1 AS LEVEL FROM jwa.Codes AA INNER JOIN CODELIST BB ON AA.PARENT_CODE = BB.CODE WHERE AA.PARENT_CODE IS NOT NULL
AND ( AA.CODE LIKE '%'+#FIND_TEXT#+'%' OR AA.NAME LIKE '%'+#FIND_TEXT#+'%' )
) SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY BB.HIER_ID) AS ROW_NO , BB.HIER_ID AS HIER_ID , REPLICATE(' ', (BB.LEVEL -1) * 5) + '▶' + AA.NAME AS HIER_NAME , AA.ID , AA.CODE , AA.NAME , AA.VALUE , AA.PARENT_CODE , AA.SORT_SEQ , AA.DESCRIPTION , AA.USE_YN , AA.OPTION_VALUE1 , AA.OPTION_VALUE2 , AA.OPTION_VALUE3 , AA.OPTION_VALUE4 , AA.OPTION_VALUE5 , AA.INS_TIME , AA.INS_USER , U1.NAME AS INS_USER_NAME , AA.UPD_TIME , AA.UPD_USER , U2.NAME AS UPD_USER_NAME FROM jwa.Codes AA WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN CODELIST BB ON AA.ID = BB.ID LEFT JOIN jwa.Users U1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.INS_USER = U1.ID LEFT JOIN jwa.Users U2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.UPD_USER = U2.ID ORDER BY ROW_NO

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CODE , AA.NAME , AA.VALUE , AA.PARENT_CODE , AA.SORT_SEQ , AA.DESCRIPTION , AA.USE_YN , AA.OPTION_VALUE1 , AA.OPTION_VALUE2 , AA.OPTION_VALUE3 , AA.OPTION_VALUE4 , AA.OPTION_VALUE5 , AA.INS_TIME , AA.INS_USER , U1.NAME AS INS_USER_NAME , AA.UPD_TIME , AA.UPD_USER , U2.NAME AS UPD_USER_NAME FROM jwa.Codes AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN jwa.Users U1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.INS_USER = U1.ID LEFT JOIN jwa.Users U2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.UPD_USER = U2.ID WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO jwa.Codes ( CODE, NAME, VALUE, PARENT_CODE, SORT_SEQ, DESCRIPTION, USE_YN, OPTION_VALUE1, OPTION_VALUE2, OPTION_VALUE3, OPTION_VALUE4, OPTION_VALUE5, INS_TIME, INS_USER ) VALUES ( #CODE#, #NAME#, #VALUE#, #PARENT_CODE#, #SORT_SEQ#, #DESCRIPTION#, #USE_YN#, #OPTION_VALUE1#, #OPTION_VALUE2#, #OPTION_VALUE3#, #OPTION_VALUE4#, #OPTION_VALUE5#, GETDATE(), #INS_USER# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update: UPDATE jwa.Codes SET CODE = #CODE# , NAME = #NAME# , VALUE = #VALUE# , PARENT_CODE = #PARENT_CODE# , SORT_SEQ = #SORT_SEQ# , DESCRIPTION = #DESCRIPTION# , USE_YN = #USE_YN# , OPTION_VALUE1 = #OPTION_VALUE1# , OPTION_VALUE2 = #OPTION_VALUE2# , OPTION_VALUE3 = #OPTION_VALUE3# , OPTION_VALUE4 = #OPTION_VALUE4# , OPTION_VALUE5 = #OPTION_VALUE5# , UPD_TIME = GETDATE() , UPD_USER = #INS_USER# WHERE ID = #ID#
